text: Reshma Nilofer Naha is an Indian female maritime pilot who currently involves in steering ships from sea to Kolkata & Haldia port. She became the first Indian as well as one among world's very few female marine pilots after being qualified as a river pilot in 2018. She received Nari Shakti Puraskar Award in 2019 from the current Indian President Ram Nath Kovind. She joined the Kolkata Port Trust in 2011 as a trainee and became Hooghly River pilot in 2018. She holds a B.E in Marine Technology from Birla Institute of Technology, Ranchi. == See also == * Abhinandan Varthaman == References == Category:Living people Category:Indian female aviators Category:People from Chennai Category:Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani alumni Category:1989 births
title: Reshma Nilofer Naha
